layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x130
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x130
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x98
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 302x18
          text run at (0,0) width 302: "The next two paragraphs should look identical:"
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,34) size 166x24 [border: (3px solid #000000)]
        LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 31x18
          text run at (3,3) width 31: "Test."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,74) size 166x24 [border: (3px solid #000000)]
        LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 31x18
          text run at (3,3) width 31: "Test."
